[Game]

Erase the line between single player and multiplayer in this high-stakes street-racing rivalry.
[ Deluxe Edition]
Origin-exclusive edition: Control the chaos with the Ultimate Cop Pack. Plus, get ahead of your rivals with bonus Speed Points,

get the Digital Revolution Livery for BMW M3 (E92) GTS and get Burnout Paradise included.Leave standard game modes in the dust.
Erase the line between single player and multiplayer in this street-racing rivalry between Cops and Racers. Seamlessly join a world where your friends are already racing and chasing. Forget isolated game modes. There are no lobbies; no waiting. You and your friends can all share the same race as paths cross and experiences merge.
Key features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ All-drive: Imagine your race and your friendÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pursuit collidingÃ¢â‚¬â€creating a world where no two events feel the same. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to play with others? Then simply choose to make Redview County yours alone and dominate the advanced Racer and Cop AI.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High-stakes rivalry: Racers are lone wolves out for glory; driving agile cars built for high-speed racing and epic chases. Cops work in teams to hunt down and bust racers using the full power of the police force. Switch roles whenever you like, and watch the stakes grow through a new scoring system that puts your speed points on the line.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Next-gen racing: Experience speed that you can truly feel in the fastest racing game around, powered by the Frostbite 3 engine. Every detail of the game world is rendered in stunning, high-definition graphics. Race and chase in snow, hail, rain, dust storms and heavy fog.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Your car, your identity: Personalize your cars with performance and style modifications. Power up your car with the latest upgrades in pursuit technology and personalize your bodywork with fresh paint jobs, liveries, custom license plates, rims and decals to show off your car to the world.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pursuit and evasion tech: Use the latest pursuit tech and modifications to change your pursuit or escape strategy on the fly. Racers evade Cops using turbo bursts, jammers and electromagnetic pulses. Cops will be armed for aggressive busts, deploying shockwaves, spikestrips and calling in police roadblocks or helicopter support.
Recommended Configuration:

OS: Windows XP 64bit
CPU: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.6 GHz

RAM: 4GB System Memory

GPU RAM: 512MB Graphics Memory

GPU: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT 512MB or AMD Radeon HD 3870

DX: DirectX 10.1
